images.imageDescription: The photo shows a black Porsche Panamera driving on the highway.
The photo shows a gray Porsche Panamera parked on a cobblestone street in front of a brick building.

The photo shows the interior of a Porsche Panamera car. The car's center console has a large touch screen that displays various car functions such as navigation, radio and climate control. Below the screen are buttons for controlling some of the main functions of the car. Next to the screen is the drive mode selector, which allows the driver to choose between different drive modes, such as economy, sport or comfort.

The photo shows the thresholds of the Porsche Panamera Turbo S. The thresholds have a chrome finish and the Porsche and Panamera Turbo S logos are applied to them. The threshold has a smooth surface and a small protrusion that makes it easier to get in and out of the car.

The photo shows the interior of a Porsche Panamera car. The dashboard has two main parts: a digital instrument panel and a central touch screen. The photo also shows that the car has red leather seats and door trim. The seats have a sporty design.

The photo shows the engine of the Porsche Panamera Turbo S E-Hybrid. It is a hybrid engine consisting of a 4.0-liter V8 gasoline engine and an electric motor. The total power of the engine is 680 horsepower.
The photo shows a gray Porsche Panamera parked in a parking lot.
The photo shows a gray Porsche Panamera parked in a parking lot.
The photo shows a gray Porsche Panamera driving on the road.
The photo shows a gray Porsche Panamera driving on the road.

name: Porsche Panamera II Turbo S E-Hybrid
description:
Porsche 911 - a sports car manufactured by the German company Porsche AG in the back of a two-door coupe or a convertible based on it, produced in different generations from 1964 to the present day. 
 The 911 index was not originally planned for the timeless designation of different generations of the same car, and was no more than one of many similar in the through three-digit internal factory numbering of all Porsche models assigned to a very specific 1964 model.

images.imageDescription: The photo shows a car parked on the side of the road at night. Silhouettes of trees and stars are visible in the background.
The photo shows a white Mitsubishi Outlander crossover parked on the side of the road in front of the building.
The photo shows the back seat of the car with black leather seats. The seats have a sporty design with pronounced side ridges.

name: Mitsubishi Outlander III Restyling 3
description:
Mitsubishi Outlander III Restyling 3 is not just another iteration of the popular Japanese crossover. It is the epitome of continuous evolution, where practicality meets dynamic power, capturing the hearts of drivers since 2015. The index 'Restyling 3' is not accidental. It symbolizes the third wave of updates that affected both the exterior and the interior of the Outlander. 
 The signature X-shaped front end with chrome accents and LED headlights draws attention and emphasizes the Outlander's sporty character. 
 Functionality at the highest level: comfortable adjustable seats, multifunctional steering wheel, modern multimedia system and many storage compartments make every trip comfortable and pleasant.

images.imageDescription: The photo shows a red Mercedes sports car parked on the side of the road in the forest. It has a sporty design with pronounced side ridges.
The photo shows a red Mercedes-Benz parked in the snow.
The photo shows a red Mercedes-Benz parked in the snow. The photo shows the back of the car.

The photo shows the digital instrument panel of a Mercedes-Benz car. The instrument panel has a 10.25-inch touchscreen that displays data such as speed, engine rpm, fuel level, coolant temperature, and more. In addition, there are several physical buttons and knobs on the instrument panel to control functions such as navigation, music player and phone.
The photo shows a door handle of a Mercedes-Benz car. The handle has a chrome finish and a shape that resembles a triangle. There is also a Mercedes-Benz logo on the arm.

name: Mercedes-Benz CLA I (C117, X117) 200
description:
Mercedes-Benz CLA I (C117, X117) 200 is not just another crossover from Mercedes-Benz. It is the embodiment of style, sportiness and dynamics that has been capturing the hearts of drivers since 2013. Expressive lines of the body, sloping windshield and extended wheel arches create the impression of hidden strength and readiness for any adventure. 
 The signature front end with chrome accents and LED headlights draws attention and emphasizes the CLA's sporty character. 
 High-quality materials such as Nappa leather, soft plastic and aluminum elements emphasize the premium interior.

images.imageDescription: The photo shows a silver Mercedes-Benz parked in a parking lot.
The photo shows a silver Mercedes-Benz parked in a parking lot.
The photo shows a silver Mercedes-Benz parked on the sidewalk.

name: Mercedes-Benz W124 420
description:
Mercedes-Benz W124 420 is not just another sedan from Mercedes-Benz. It is the embodiment of elegance, power and comfort that has captured the hearts of drivers since 1984. 
 Elegant touches, such as chrome decorative elements and stylish alloy wheels, complete the image of a modern and elegant sedan. 
 The spacious interior easily accommodates five adult passengers, giving them a sense of comfort and freedom. The panoramic roof and large windows create an additional feeling of lightness and space. 
 Modern safety and comfort technologies, such as anti-lock braking system, traction control system and much more, make driving the W124 safe and enjoyable.

images.imageDescription: The photo shows a black 2002 Mercedes-Benz E-Class driving down a country road.
The photo shows a black 2002 Mercedes-Benz E-Class driving down a country road.

name: Mercedes-Benz E-Class III (W211, S211) Restyling 230
description:
Mercedes-Benz E-Class III (W211, S211) Restyling 230 is not just another iteration of the iconic E-class. It is the epitome of evolution, where classic luxury meets modern technology and dynamic power. Since 2006, this version has captured the hearts of drivers seeking to combine elegance and drive. 
 Smooth, elegant body lines create an impression of luxury and dynamism. The sloping windshield and long hood emphasize the sporty character, while the chrome accents on the grille and windows add elegance. 
 Comfortable seats with electric adjustment and heating ensure a comfortable ride, even on long distances.

images.imageDescription: The photo shows a parked Audi A7 Sportback.
The photo shows a parked Audi A7 Sportback.

name: Audi A7 I (4G) S-tronic
description:
Audi A7 I (4G) S-tronic is not just another grand coupe from Audi. It is the embodiment of elegance, sportiness and technology that has been capturing the hearts of drivers since 2010. 
 Smooth, elegant body lines create an impression of luxury and dynamism. The sloping windshield and long hood emphasize the sporty character, while the chrome accents on the grille and windows add elegance. 
 The modern MMI Navigation Plus multimedia system with a color display and navigation makes every trip exciting.

name: Lamborghini Huracan 2023
description:
Lamborghini Huracan 2023 is not just another version of the cult supercar. It is the epitome of evolution, where dynamics, power and style combine with modern technology and comfort. Since 2014, this version has captured the hearts of drivers who want to experience a real adventurous ride. 
 Expressive lines of the body, sloping hood and inflated wheel arches create the impression of power and readiness for any adventure. 
 7-speed ISR automatic transmission provides smooth gear changes and emotional sound of the engine. 
 The All-Wheel Drive system provides maximum traction in all weather conditions.
